groups.name: zonky.test.database
groups.description: Configuration properties for Zonky Embedded Database library.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure prefetching of prepared databases.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure embedded PostgreSQL database.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for PostgreSQL database running in a Docker container. Only available if database provider is set to Docker.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.yandex-provider
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for Yandex's Embedded PostgreSQL Server. Only available if database provider is set to Yandex.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.mssql
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure embedded MSSQL database.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.mssql.docker
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for MSSQL database running in a Docker container. Only available if database provider is set to Docker.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.mysql
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure embedded MySQL database.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.mysql.docker
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for MySQL database running in a Docker container. Only available if database provider is set to Docker.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.mariadb
groups.description: Configuration properties to configure embedded MariaDB database.

groups.name: zonky.test.database.mariadb.docker
groups.description: Additional configuration properties for MariaDB database running in a Docker container. Only available if database provider is set to Docker.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.type
properties.description: The type of embedded database to be created when replacing the data source.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.provider
properties.description: Provider to be used to create the underlying embedded database, see the documentation for the comparison matrix.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.refresh
properties.description: Determines the refresh mode of the embedded database.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.replace
properties.description: Determines what type of existing DataSource beans can be replaced.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Prefix to use for the names of database prefetching threads.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.concurrency
properties.description: Maximum number of concurrently running database prefetching threads.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.pipeline-cache-size
properties.description: Maximum number of prepared databases per pipeline (the pipeline is a queue of independent databases that contains the same initial data).

properties.name: zonky.test.database.prefetching.max-prepared-templates
properties.description: Maximum number of prepared database templates.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.client.properties
properties.description: Additional PostgreSQL options used to configure the test data source.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.initdb.properties
properties.description: Additional PostgreSQL options to pass to initdb command during the database initialization.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.server.properties
properties.description: Additional PostgreSQL options used to configure the embedded database server.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker.image
properties.description: Docker image containing PostgreSQL database.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker.tmpfs.enabled
properties.description: Whether to mount postgres data directory as tmpfs.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.docker.tmpfs.options
properties.description: Mount options used to configure the tmpfs filesystem.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.postgres.yandex-provider.postgres-version
properties.description: Version of EnterpriseDB PostgreSQL binaries (https://www.enterprisedb.com/download-postgresql-binaries). 11+ for Linux available on https://www.postgresql.org/download/

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mssql.client.properties
properties.description: Additional MSSQL options used to configure the test data source.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mssql.docker.image
properties.description: Docker image containing MSSQL database.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mysql.client.properties
properties.description: Additional MySQL options used to configure the test data source.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mysql.docker.image
properties.description: Docker image containing MySQL database.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mysql.docker.tmpfs.enabled
properties.description: Whether to mount database data directory as tmpfs.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mysql.docker.tmpfs.options
properties.description: Mount options used to configure the tmpfs filesystem.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mariadb.client.properties
properties.description: Additional MariaDB options used to configure the test data source.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mariadb.docker.image
properties.description: Docker image containing MariaDB database.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mariadb.docker.tmpfs.enabled
properties.description: Whether to mount database data directory as tmpfs.

properties.name: zonky.test.database.mariadb.docker.tmpfs.options
properties.description: Mount options used to configure the tmpfs filesystem.

values.description: Database is detected automatically based on the classpath.
Default typically equals to docker provider, unless a different default has been configured by configuration properties.
Run the embedded database in Docker as a container.
Use Zonky's fork of OpenTable Embedded PostgreSQL Component to create the embedded database (https://github.com/zonkyio/embedded-postgres).
Use OpenTable Embedded PostgreSQL Component to create the embedded database (https://github.com/opentable/otj-pg-embedded).
Use Yandex's Embedded PostgreSQL Server to create the embedded database (https://github.com/yandex-qatools/postgresql-embedded).
